description: A mid-sized fish, adapted to living underground. It has extremley small eyes.
A small fish, adapted to living underground. It has extremley small eyes, and often darts about to and fro.
A large flat fish, adaped to living underground. It has long whiskers, and no visible eyes, as it glides along the bottom.
A large oblong fish, with sharp rows of teeth. It has a glowing antannae upon its forehead, as it lies in wait for prey.
